subject: 2 pedals set received
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,
I ordered one set of pedals from AliExpress but realized that I forgot to
apply a coupon. I canceled the order and placed a new one using the
discount.

After about one to two weeks, I received the pedals. However, about a week
later, I unexpectedly received another set as well.

I believe this second set was sent by mistake. I would like to return it,
so please let me know how you would like to proceed and if you can provide
return instructions.


Sincerely,
Hasan Lutfi

conversations.body_text: Hi Hasan Lutfi,  Hello, please provide your order number or contact our store customer service on AliExpress.
